title: The Dresden Cross Choir in its hometown = Der Dresdener Kreushor in seiner heimatstadt
brief_description: The Dresden Choir consists of 80 young men and boys ranging from10-20 years old and has been in existence from 156 years. Shots of the city of Dresden are interspersed with those of the Choir singing in concerts, practising and relaxing.
